title: Boris Johnson reshuffles his government, demoting official who oversaw chaotic Kabul evacuation
content:
1. Boris Johnson reshuffles his government, demoting official who oversaw chaotic Kabul evacuation  The Washington Post
  2. Boris Johnson reshuffles cabinet as Williamson sacked and Raab replaced by Truss  Channel 4 News
  3. Cabinet reshuffle: Dominic Raab moved from foreign secretary and Gavin Williamson sacked  Sky News
  4. We’ve had a reshuffle, but no change of direction for this hapless government  The Guardian
  5. Raab's appointment as Justice Secretary shows failure is not punished in Johnson's Cabinet  iNews
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Boris Johnson reshuffles his government, demoting official who oversaw chaotic Kabul evacuation  The Washington Post
Boris Johnson reshuffles cabinet as Williamson sacked and Raab replaced by Truss  Channel 4 News
Cabinet reshuffle: Dominic Raab moved from foreign secretary and Gavin Williamson sacked  Sky News
We’ve had a reshuffle, but no change of direction for this hapless government  The Guardian
Raab's appointment as Justice Secretary shows failure is not punished in Johnson's Cabinet  iNews
